info.title: Policy Service
info.description: The policy service exposes HTTP API for executing policies.

get.description: Evaluate executes a policy with the given 'data' as input.

parameters.name: x-evaluation-id
parameters.description: EvaluationID allows overwriting the randomly generated evaluationID

parameters.name: x-cache-ttl
parameters.description: Policy result cache TTL in seconds

parameters.name: any
parameters.description: Input data passed to the policy execution runtime.

ETag.description: ETag contains unique identifier of the policy evaluation and can be used to later retrieve the results from Cache.

post.description: Evaluate executes a policy with the given 'data' as input.

parameters.name: x-evaluation-id
parameters.description: EvaluationID allows overwriting the randomly generated evaluationID

parameters.name: x-cache-ttl
parameters.description: Policy result cache TTL in seconds

parameters.name: any
parameters.description: Input data passed to the policy execution runtime.

ETag.description: ETag contains unique identifier of the policy evaluation and can be used to later retrieve the results from Cache.

get.description: Evaluate executes a policy with the given 'data' as input.

parameters.name: x-evaluation-id
parameters.description: EvaluationID allows overwriting the randomly generated evaluationID

parameters.name: x-cache-ttl
parameters.description: Policy result cache TTL in seconds

parameters.name: any
parameters.description: Input data passed to the policy execution runtime.

ETag.description: ETag contains unique identifier of the policy evaluation and can be used to later retrieve the results from Cache.

post.description: Lock a policy so that it cannot be evaluated.

delete.description: Unlock a policy so it can be evaluated again.

get.description: List policies from storage with optional filters.

parameters.name: rego
parameters.description: Include policy source code in results (optional).

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Include policy static data in results (optional).
